title: Curriculum Vitae
Ian Zablon Owuor
text: I’m an Industrial Chemist and Data Analyst with a passion for uncovering insights through science and data. With hands-on experience in laboratory research and advanced data management, I’ve worked on impactful projects, including roles at PBORA and as a freelance data analyst. My expertise spans chemical analysis, data visualization, and leveraging tools like R to solve complex problems. I’m driven by curiosity, precision, and a commitment to making a difference through innovative solutions. Welcome to my corner of the web, where I share my journey and expertise!

title: About
text: I’m an Industrial Chemist and Data Analyst passionate about transforming science into actionable insights for Kenyan industries and beyond. With experience at PBORA and as a freelance data analyst, I specialize in chemical analysis, data visualization, and leveraging tools like R to solve complex problems. Whether it’s optimizing manufacturing processes or uncovering trends in datasets, I’m driven to make a tangible impact. Outside of work, I’m inspired by Kenya’s vibrant innovation scene and enjoy exploring data-driven solutions for local challenges.

title: BSc. Industrial Chemistry Certificate
Determination of Sodium Metabisulfite preservative levels in Meat and Meat products in Kakamega Town using Ultraviolet-Visible method and the Monier-williams Experiment

title: Quality of Red Wine Prediction using R
text: Welcome to my analysis of red wine quality prediction using R. This project explores the relationship between physicochemical properties, such as fixed acidity and alcohol content, and sensory quality ratings, leveraging advanced data analysis techniques in R. As an Industrial Chemist with a passion for data-driven quality control, I aim to provide actionable insights for winemakers and quality assurance professionals. Explore this project to see how I combine chemical expertise with statistical modeling to predict wine qualityhere

title: Welcome to the Life Expectancy Dashboard using Quarto-Markdown!
text: Dive into the fascinating world of global health with our interactive Life Expectancy Dashboard, powered by the renowned Gapminder dataset! Explore how life expectancy has evolved across countries and continents, uncover trends, and gain insights into the factors shaping our world’s longevity—all at your fingertips with vibrant, easy-to-navigate visualizations.here

title: Welcome to the 2018 Kenya Demographic Health Survey Analysis
text:
Explore key health and demographic insights from the 2018 Kenya Demographic Health Survey, covering respondents aged 15–49. I have simplified a large dataset by selecting essential columns and renaming variables for clarity. The refined data is now clear and ready for analysis, with numbers turned into meaningful text.
Discover what the data reveals about Kenya’s health landscape—dive in today! here

title: Fertility rate trends Dashboard for Brazil, China and India
text: Welcome to my analysis of fertility rate trends in India, China, and Brazil. This dashboard explores how fertility rates, measured as births per woman, have evolved over time in these key global economies. Dive into an interactive table of global fertility data, a timelapse animation, and a line plot comparing trends across Brazil, China, and India, inspired by Gapminder’s data visualization approach.here

title: Mazingira Day: Celebrating Kenya’s Environment
text:
Mazingira Day, celebrated every October 10th, coincides with World Environment Day. In Kenya, it is a national holiday dedicated to environmental conservation, tree planting, and raising awareness about our natural heritage.
On October 10th, 2025, PBORA partnered with Hatch Technologies, a local environmental NGO, to host a full-day Mazingira Day celebration that brought together community members, professionals, and youth volunteers. The event kicked off with an inspiring opening ceremony where representatives from both organizations spoke on the urgency of environmental conservation in Kenya, followed by a large-scale tree planting drive where participants planted over 150 indigenous seedlings — including Mukau, Croton, and Acacia — across a designated green belt. In the afternoon, teams fanned out across the neighborhood for a community clean-up exercise. The day closed with an environmental education forum featuring talks on climate change, citizen science, and sustainable living. It was a powerful reminder that lasting environmental change happens when science, technology, and community come together — and PBORA and Hatch Technologies proved exactly that.



Group Photo Before Embaking on Tree Planting

title: Mazingira Day: Celebrating Kenya’s Environment
text:
Why It Matters
Kenya’s environment faces threats from deforestation, pollution, and climate change. Mazingira Day brings communities together to take action through activities like planting trees, cleaning the environment by picking garbage and disponsing them at the desinated places.









Taking a Walk to the Tree planting site







Group Selfie with my Coleagues









Me planting a Tree

title: Mazingira Day: Celebrating Kenya’s Environment
text:
How You Can Participate

Plant a tree in your compound or local park
Join a community clean-up drive
Reduce plastic use in your daily life
Educate others about environmental conservation ```
